src:
V Celje prihajata seks v živo in svingerski kotiček
Na najbolj vročem sejemskem dogodku sLOVErotika v Celju napovedujejo spektakel s performansi največjih evropskih zvezd pornoindustrije.
03 Nov 2019, 08:59 by M. M.



Veronica Avluv je v svet zabavne industrije za odrasle vstopila šele pri 37 letih. FOTO: C. S.



V Celje prihaja tudi znani italijanski erotični zvezdnik Rocco Siffredi.



Najprej pornese, nato Božički FOTO: C. S.



FOTO: C. S.



Dogajanje v dveh nadstropjih hale L in na šestih odrih bodo popestrili številne seksi delavnice, svingerski kotiček, erotični šovi, tantrična doživetja, orgije, seks v živo …FOTO: C. S.


Le še mesec dni nas loči od pestrega, vročega in poželjivega dogajanja v novembru (29. in 30.), ko se bo v Celju odvijal prvi Eroticland, največji evropski regijski erotični festival na naših, slovenskih tleh. Sejem sLOVErotika, ki je kar 11 let tradicionalno dvigoval temperaturo in srčni utrip domačih ter tujih obiskovalcev, je namreč prerasel domače sejemske okvire in letos se bo prvič odvil v obliki mednarodnega erotičnega festivala, ki so ga organizatorji poimenovali Eroticland. Na njem obljubljajo dvodnevni spektakel s performansi največjih zvezdnic in zvezdnikov iz evropske zabavne industrije za odrasle. Med temi bosta kralj in ikona evropske erotične zabavne industrije, Italijan Rocco Siffredi s svojim t. i. orgy orkestrom in ameriška biseksualna zvezdnica, prejemnica številnih nagrad Veronica Avluv.
10.000 obiskovalcev pričakujejo prireditelji.


V Celje prihaja tudi znani italijanski erotični zvezdnik Rocco Siffredi.

»Rocco Siffredi je blestel v več kot 1300 filmih za odrasle, njegov hardcore stil pa v svetovni pornoindustriji ni ostal neopažen, saj danes spada med največja svetovna erotična imena. Kljub temu da se je od igralstva pred leti že poslovil, pa je še vedno spletni zvezdnik ter režiser in producent. V Celju bo s svojo orkestrsko orgijo v živo predstavil nekaj, česar Evropa še ni videla,« obljubljajo organizatorji, ki so tega, da se je Italijan odzval njihovemu povabilu, izjemno veseli.
Šest odrov
Letošnje dogajanje na kar šestih odrih bodo popestrili številne seksi delavnice, svingerski kotiček, erotični šovi, tantrična doživetja, orgije, seks v živo in še mnogo drugih vzburljivih nastopov zvezdnikov iz zabavne industrije za odrasle. »Nov koncept dogodka se odmika od dosedanjega sejemskega dogajanja in odpira vrata čisto novemu, še nevidenemu spektaklu in zabavi.


FOTO: C. S.

Veliko bo erotičnega dogajanja v živo, dovršena scenografija in avdio-vizualni šovi pa bodo spominjali na dogajanje v diskoteki ali na kakšnem velikem koncertnem dogodku,« še napovedujejo organizatorji, ki so k sodelovanju povabili tudi ekipo podjetja Temma-x, ki ima bogate izkušnje z organizacijo mega dogodkov, med drugim z mednarodno priznanim tolminskim festivalom MetalDays. Dogajanje na Eroticlandu bo seks šove spremenilo v glamurozne nastope v živo z avdio-vizualnimi efekti, lučmi, laserji, ognjem ter vizualizacijami. V Celje bo prišla tudi ameriška pornesa, prejemnica številnih nagrad, izkušena Veronica Avluv, ki je kljub temu da je v svet zabavne industrije za odrasle vstopila pozno, šele pri 37 letih, v 10 letih svoje poželjive kariere zbrala številne nagrade in nominacije za svetovne performanse. A to zagotovo ni edino znano ime nastopajočih, te bodo organizatorji, ki v Celju pričakujejo vsaj 10.000 obiskovalcev, tudi iz Italije, Avstrije, Hrvaške, Madžarske, Srbije in drugih držav, razkrili v prihodnjih dneh.
text:
Live sex and swingers come to Celje
At the hottest SLOVErotica fair in Celje, a spectacle from the performances of the biggest European stars of the porn industry is announced.
03 Nov 2019, 08:59 by M.M.



Veronica Avluv only entered the adult entertainment industry at the age of 37. PHOTO: С.С.



Famous Italian erotic star Rocco Siffredi is also coming to Celje.



First pornes, then Santa Clauses PHOTO: C.S.



PHOTO: С.С.



The events on the two floors of Hall L and the six stages will enrich many sexy workshops, swingers' corner, erotic shows, tantric experiences, orgies, live sex ... PHOTO: C.S.


It is only a month away from the colorful, hot and desirable events in November (29th and 30th), when the first Eroticland, Europe's largest regional erotic festival on our Slovenian soil, will take place in Celje. The SLOVErotica fair, which has traditionally raised the temperature and heart rate of domestic and foreign visitors for 11 years, has outgrown domestic fairgrounds and this year will be held for the first time in the form of an international erotic festival, called by the organizers Eroticland. It promises a two-day spectacle of performances by the biggest celebrities and celebrities from the European adult entertainment industry. Among these will be the king and icon of the European erotic entertainment industry, Italian Rocco Siffredi with his t. i. orgy orchestra and American bisexual superstar, recipient of many Veronica Avluv awards.
10,000 visitors expect the event.


Famous Italian erotic star Rocco Siffredi is also coming to Celje.

"Rocco Siffredi has shined in over 1300 adult films, and his hardcore style has not gone unnoticed in the global porn industry, being one of the world's biggest erotic names today. Although he has said goodbye to the cast years ago, he is still an online celebrity, director and producer. He will present in Celje with his orchestra orchestra live something that Europe has never seen before, "promise the organizers, who are extremely pleased that the Italian has responded to their invitation.
Six scaffolding
This year's events on as many as six stages will enrich many sexy workshops, swingers' corner, erotic shows, tantric experiences, orgies, live sex and many other exciting performances by celebrities from the adult entertainment industry. »The new concept of the event is moving away from what has been happening so far and opening the door to a whole new spectacle and entertainment.


PHOTO: С.С.

There will be plenty of erotic live events, and the sophisticated scenery and audio-visual shows will be reminiscent of going to a disco or some big concert event, "said the organizers, who also invited a team of Temma-x, which has extensive experience with organizing mega events, including the internationally recognized MetalDays Tolmin Festival. Going on Eroticland will turn the sex show into glamorous live performances with audio-visual effects, lights, lasers, fire and visuals. Veronica Avluv, an American porn artist, recipient of numerous awards, will come to Celje even though she entered the world of the adult entertainment industry only at the age of 37, and has collected numerous awards and nominations for world performances in 10 years . However, this is certainly not the only known name of the performers, which will be revealed by organizers who expect at least 10,000 visitors in Celje, including from Italy, Austria, Croatia, Hungary, Serbia and other countries, in the coming days.
